Desc.entry: A free wellbeing drop-in shop in Sharrow run by trained staff offering friendly advice, support and motivation towards improving your own health. Provides one-to-one sessions in healthy lifestyle, stopping smoking, diabetes management, weight management and counselling. Group sessions are also run on managing your diabetes and healthy eating. There is also a Health Champions programme based at Shipshape which helps to enable volunteers to support their own community in making positive changes to their health.

Langs.entry: Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, Mandarin, Punjabi, Urdu, other languages by arrangement
